TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Because, as it follows from its name,  the vehicle is a small particle of veh, while the cars are big.

Why do the bikers run bicycles?

Because the hill is too steep to pedal up.

Why do nerds suddenly appear?

To let the muggles' life be full of sense.

Was Hogwarts immune to V-2?

Sadly not, a few V-2 rockets could destroy most of not all of the building. 

How do I pass Spanish?

Si.

Is Dumble d'Ore called so before or after being balrogged?

After he got the perfume commercial.

What did Jeb see today?

Jeb did see that both American uranium hydride and uranium deuteride fission cores in Upshot-Knothole were having exactly same size like the secret Swiss and Iraqi pure uranium ones, in Mk6 hull matching the Mk3 warhead size.

Does it mean that they match the American Mk 3 pit can not just coincidentally, but Mk3 was originally meant as pure uranium implosion?

Probably

Why do people think the saturn C-8 is ugly?

Because they haven't seen the alternative shuttle designs.

How many parking places needs Chrysler TV-8?

None. No parking space needs anything.

What is green and black and red all over?

Kerbal after EVA landing.

Are there invisible constellations on the sky?

Not that I can see.

Are we the Ancients?

Sometimes I have a feeling that we are the Fossils.

Why were the dinosaurs nit hunting mammoths together with prehistorical humans? The games show that they could.

I don't understand the question. Dinosaurs before big rock hits planet, humans well after big rock hits planet.

Is there a smile under the ocean?

Yes. At least a  half of Titanic passengers are still smiling.

Why do they plug a guitar to the outlet? Do they believe that the electric hit is the only way to make the musician play hits?

They do that to shock the guitar player

Why do we use plane instead of ICBM

Because the kids would giggle whenever you say it.

What are your thoughts on showers?

Depends on what they are showing.

Why do they call the repropellanting "refueling"? Don't they also need "reoxidizering"?

They do but people get lazy with language.

When did everyone get so old?

They are doing this for at least the last fifty years.

Why swan, swift, and swallow start from sw?

Because people swear when they swat a switch while swivelling South West.

Where have all the flowers gone?

Withered on finding a pi.

Why is Math very easy?

Because it has very hard afterMath.

Spoiler

 

Who had bound the galaxies?

13 hours ago, kerbiloid said:

Who had bound the galaxies?

Glue, most definitely.

Who didn't factor?

Mr X

Why do I like to fly kites?
